name: Isotope Insect
description:
Welcome to my world!

The common ant's life is very hard, but these insects are not so regular. A radiation contaminated their dna, so they have become larger day by day. After all, their brain was developed, and they began to use weapons.

Green ants, plant like weapons, mad armed AI, Multiplayer/Co-op.

Here the newest version! (v0.1.152)



Register on the official site and download the game, or updater from itch.io. (Updater actually disabled)
Total size of application: 419 MB

!! Important !! Actually the download of updater is disabled beacuse the antivirus blocked it with IDP.Generic alert. Could be a false positive. We will try to find out what causing it. So be patient. Even so, you can download the game but not the updater. If you have problem with download, login, or something else, please send me a message.

Here the newer version of the game. Now you can play with computer players (AI). Go buy weapon from dealer in 'Equipments' store, and go to the big box like hut. In there the colonel waiting for you, so enter the portal.
Do you need to complete the tutorial before can go fight.

First steps:


Click on the banner and register.
Activate your account.
Log in on the webpage.
Download the latest version via 'Versions' menu.
Play.

Don't worry, if you are the only in the battle map. Ai controlled ants automatically create on begin. (Not visible in scoreboard)


Tutorial first mission:

  • Follow the glowing area, to reach the bag.

    • Tutorial second mission:
  • Pick up the blue berries.

    • Tutorial third mission:
  • Pick up the practice gun, and shoot the moving targets.

    • Under development

    • Trade with NPC (Done)
    • Quests (On the way)
    • AI(On the way)

    Map types

    • FFA (Available)
    • Team Death Match (Available)
    • Capture The Food (Available)
    • Get a Food (Planned)
    • Race (Planned)
    • Domination (Planned)
    • King of the Hill (Available)

    Weapons

    • Bean Gun - Like assault rifle
    • Raisin Gun - Like shotgun
    • Carrot Cannon - Like rocket launcher
    • Corn Gun - Like rifle
    • Pepper Gun - Like pistol
    • Ice Gun - Like assault rifle
    • Grenade - Like umm.. grenade :)
    • ...

    Playable maps

    • Forest - Village
    • Tavern - Drink N Chat
    • Kitchen - For Battle
    • Garage - For Battle
    • Yard - For Battle (Disabled)
    • Dark Forest - First area with aggressive mobs (New)
    • Livingroom - For Battle (New)
    • ...

    Control

    • Mouse (Look around - Aiming)
    • W,A,S,D (Movement)
    • Space (Jump)
    • E (Interact)
    • I (Inventory & Character)
    • Enter (Open chat)
    • Escape (Leave map or game)

    Commands via chat

    • @minigame *gamename*
    • @ping .. Simple ping for network testing
    • @freecam .. Do you can fly free with cam for screenshot

    Total size of application: 419 MB
